title: Oct 19 Week 4 Reflection
text:
Reflections for Improvement

Ideas for onboarding new people (Beginner’s Starting Guide?):

create a QR code to a place on the website for beginner

beginning survey
joining Slack and bootcamp channel
link to installation page (page already made)
what about an explanation for total beginners about what R is used for?
description of the RStudio interface

link that cheetsheet



Make many exercises like this week’s practice had. Honestly even more than the six that we had would be beneficial.
The starter code was very useful also.
The dropdown box for the correct code seemed less than effective. A few of the student’s didn’t realize it was an option.
There should also be a note to instructors page that helps instructors know how to use the website and suggestions on how to run the class.
I was the most prepared for this lesson out of all of them so far and it was also the smoothest lesson. One thing that helped it go more smoothly was that those that came were more familiar with the process and there were less people to corral.

title: Thoughts on Using Quarto
